item.title: Indie Tools: Wave Accounting
item.description: Indie Tools is a series that dives into the apps and services I use to run my bootstrapped indie-development business. These work for me, but may not be right for you. My first career was accounting and small-business consulting, which has been helpful in running my own business. I’m really comfortable with the idea of profit-and-loss reports, balance sheets, and cash flow, and so I haven’t had much of a need for accounting and bookkeeping services.
